lead_paragraph: WEISFUSE--Rahel, nee Ginsburg, of Riverdale, NY, formerly of Garden City, NY, passed away peacefully on March 21, 2016 after a long illness at age 97. Predeceased by her beloved husband, Dr. Louis Weisfuse in 1968, she will be sorely missed by her children Deborah Lipner Weisfuse (Robert Lipner), Judith Weisfuse (Michael Wax), and Isaac Weisfuse (Evelyn Horn), as well as grandchildren Eva Jenny Sokol (Jason Sokol), Louis Lipner (Annika Goldman), Deborah and Aaron Wax, Ari and Lois Weisfuse, and great-granddaughters Ruby and Madeline Sokol. May her memory be for a blessing. Donations may be made to Zamir Choral Foundation.org. 1/3
